prompt:
Cinematic medium full shot of a ferocious elderly East Asian martial arts master, wild and voluminous unkempt grey and white hair blowing in the wind, long straggly beard and mustache, weathered face with deep wrinkles and grime, intense piercing eyes, aggressive snarling expression, crouching low in a dynamic three-point landing stance on dry cracked desert earth, wearing tattered and heavily distressed dark indigo and charcoal Hanfu-style robes with frayed edges and coarse fabric texture, rough cloth arm wrappings, worn leather boots.

Hands are clawed and pressing near the ground, channeling dark mystical energy, ethereal swirls of dark blue and black smoke tendrils rising from the sand, the ground fracturing and cracking beneath his fingers, sand particles and debris floating and flying into the air from the shockwave, kinetic energy.

Background is a blurred arid desert landscape with rocky outcrops, dusty atmosphere, volumetric lighting, harsh dramatic cinematic lighting, high contrast, gritty texture, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, shot on Sony A7R IV with 85mm f/1.4 lens, extremely detailed skin texture and fabric folds, Wuxia fantasy aesthetic, epic action freeze-frame.
